mapper.select: select max(box.formid) inboundPlanId, box.id boxnum ,sum(ca.quantity) qty, max(box.weight) weight, max(box.length) length,max(box.width) width,max(box.height) height , max(box.tracking_id) tracking_id,max(box.package_status) package_status from t_erp_ship_v2_inboundshipment_box box left join t_erp_ship_v2_inboundshipment_boxitem ca on ca.boxid=box.id where box.shipmentid=#{shipmentid,jdbcType=CHAR} group by box.id
